column3: 2015 opelousas - a mass of christian burial will be held at 10:00 a. m. for gabrielle gabby alexandra la. jack
column7: at st. landry catholic church in opelousas. reverend jared suire will celebrate the mass. rite of committal will be held at bellevue memorial park cemetery. gabrielle ""gabby"" alexandra la. jack
column10: was called home by our lord june 9
column13: frequently infecting those around her with her laugh and silly antics. she was a kind soul who tended to the needs of others
column14: and had a special place in her heart for her family pets. her quirky sense of humor was well-known to her friends and classmates. as a senior and honor student at opelousas catholic
column15: gabby was a leader being selected to serve as a member of the ministry team and cheerleading squad. she loved to cheer -- her megaphone and pompoms were with her always. gabby was confident in her catholic faith
column16: and her faith journey through the sacraments. she lived deeply her faith as demonstrated when she served the children of guatemala on a recent mission trip. her life revealed the beautiful love shared between herself and our lord. this faith offers comfort to her family with the knowledge that her radiant spirit will be with them forever. gabby was a most precious and beloved daughter to her parents
column17: sonny and kim la. jack -- she was their joy; a treasured sister to her siblings lindsey and logan
column19: and kimberly soileau; and a loving aunt g to her infant nephew
column20: jefferson. gabby will live forever in our hearts. gabbys survivors are her parents
column21: sonny and kim bordelon la. jack
column30: danielle la. jack liner and husband
column32: of texas; lindsey marie la. jack of new orleans
column33: la and kimberly daire soileau and husband
column37: ty and lane soileau and jefferson liner and her godmothers
column39: channy manuel and kim daire. she was preceded in death by her paternal grandparents
column41: sr. and lucille moore la. jack. pallbearers will be donnie bordelon
column45: gary la. jack and logan la. jack. honorary pallbearers will be her godfather
column46: neal whipp and the senior class of opelousas catholic. visitation will be held on thursday
column49: from 3:00 p. m. to 9:00 p. m. and will reopen on friday
column52: at 7:00 a. m. until time of service. a rosary will be prayed at 7:00 p. m. on thursday. family and friends are invited to sign and view the online guestbook at www. lafondardoin. com. la. fond-ardoin funeral home of opelousas
